abstract: Citigroup and General Electric held preliminary talks this year about deal to link their credit card businesses, which withered due to disagreements over the price-tag, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Citigroup and General Electric held preliminary talks this year about deal to link their credit card businesses, which withered due to disagreements over the price-tag, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup and General Electric held preliminary discussions this year about a deal to link their credit card businesses, but the talks withered over disagreements about the price tag, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Citigroup and G.E. Said to Drop Credit Card Deal
